item.title: Seeking innovative solutions to address the challenges posed by COVID-19
item.description:
The Infocomm Media Development Authority (IMDA) in Singapore has launched an initiative through its Open Innovation Platform (OIP) to address challenges arising from COVID-19 and beyond. Established in 2018, the OIP helps companies source creative ideas, expertise, and resources to meet their innovation and business needs, fostering the development of novel digital solutions. This Innovation Call, themed “COVID-19 & Beyond â€“ Innovation for Social Good”, aims to find solutions for issues faced by vulnerable individuals and businesses in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/seeking-innovative-solutions-to-address-the-challenges-posed-by-covid-19/
